allow: Bash(powershell -Command "Get-ChildItem ''C:\\Program Files\\Deno'' -Recurse -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Get-ChildItem ''$env:USERPROFILE\\.deno'' -Recurse -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Get-ChildItem ''C:\\Users\\TY\\AppData\\Local\\Programs\\Deno'' -Recurse -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue")
